module.name: shape_property_assignment
module.keywords: application, module, shape, shape aspect, shape dependent property

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the identification of the shape of an object and portions of that shape and to characterize with properties a shape or shape portion.
The 2nd edition incorporates modifications of the previous edition.

purpose.p: Modifications made to the mapping specification of the following entity definitions (removed):

inscope.li: identification of an object that may have properties but cannot be considered as a product or an activity;
concept of shape of an object;
identification of a portion of a shape;
relationship between two portions of shape;
shape of an object in the context of a particular occurrence of that object in a product structure;
association of a representation with a shape or shape portion;
assignment of shape related properties to a shape or to a shape portion.

uof.name: Shape_Property_Assignment
uof.description: The Shape_Property_Assignment UoF specifies the data structure needed to assign shape to items, and to assign additional properties to shape.
